title: Manually Set Up Related Products
description: A merchandiser wants to manually define a set of 'related products' to display on a specific product page (e.g., showing the matching charger and case for a phone).

tasks.description: Provide a list of SKUs for the related products (e.g., 'Charger-Z', 'Case-Z').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent inputs the list of related SKUs.

tasks.description: Save this list as the manually curated 'related products' for 'Smartphone Z'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the product relationship in the PIM.
